forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
